awwv_meta.source: Balkan Battlegrounds Vol. I Appendices G & H; corrected Feb 9, 2026
awwv_meta.rule: Strict alignment with Appendix H (ARBiH), Appendix G (VRS), and HVO Master List.
corrections_applied: Fixed all 46 VRS 1st Krajina Corps assignments
Fixed all 11 VRS 2nd Krajina Corps assignments
Added 3 missing VRS Drina Corps brigades
Fixed HVO OZ assignments for all brigades
Fixed 15 HRHB brigades with vrs_herzegovina -> correct HVO OZ
Added available_from turn number to all 261 brigades
Added mandatory: true for all turn-0 brigades

brigades.name: "Doboj" Operational Group 9 (9th Recce, 9th MP, 9th Mixed Engineer)
30th Infantry Division elements (30th Recce, 30th MP, 30th Comms, 36th Ind Armored Bn)
